Package upgrader

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IState
    The upgrader application runs in either of following 4 states at a time:
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractApplicationState
    Base implementation for the application states.
    LocateClasspathEntriesState
    The application state it searches for references to old libraries and shows confirmation for the upgrade/changes that would take.
    LocateReplacementState
    The application state where you locate the new library that is to replace old ones.
    MakeReplacementState
    The application state where all replacement/upgrade takes place.
    SearchLibraryState
    The initial state of the application.
    Upgrader
    A small cli tool that makes 3rd party libraries upgrade easier, faster, and auditable.
    You may find this tool helpful if you have 50+ libraries for an upgrade and each might affect 10+ projects.
